problem_text_cn: 如图,在▱ABCD中,∠ABC,∠BCD的平分线BE,CF分别与AD相交于点E、F,BE与CF相交于点G,若AB=3,BC=5,CF=2,则BE的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, the bisectors of ∠ABC and ∠BCD intersect at points E and F, respectively, and BE intersects with CF at point G. If AB = N_0, BC = N_1, CF = N_2, Then the length of BE is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB∥CD,∴∠ABC+∠BCD=180°,∵∠ABC、∠BCD的平分线BE、CF分别与AD相交于点E、F,∴∠EBC+∠FCB=\frac{1}{2}∠ABC+\frac{1}{2}∠DCB=90°∴EB⊥FC；过A作AM∥FC,交BC于M,如图所示:∵AM∥FC,∴∠AOB=∠FGB,∵EB⊥FC,∴∠FGB=90°,∴∠AOB=90°,∵BE平分∠ABC,∴∠ABE=∠EBC,∵AD∥BC,∴∠AEB=∠CBE,∴∠ABE=∠AEB,∴AB=AE=3,∵AO⊥BE,∴BO=EO,在△AOE和△MOB中,≥ft\{\begin{matrix}∠AEO=∠MBO&\\BO=EO&\\∠AOE=∠BOM&\\\end{matrix}\right.\,∴△AOE≌△MOB(ASA),∴AO=MO,∵AF∥CM,AM∥FC,∴四边形AMCF是平行四边形,∴AM=FC=2,∴AO=1,∴EO=√{AE²-AO²}=2√{2},∴BE=4√{2}；故选:C．
